name: Star Charms
description: Star Charms is a simple, pretty game where you click charms that match the color of your bouncing star. There are also chain combos to clear a bunch of charms at once, and the occasional supernova explosion to blast away even more. Play gets tricky at higher levels and requires quick thinking and reactions. There are 50 built-in levels and a level editor in case you want to add more.
